64 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
68 VolOctreeMapper::VolOctreeMapper(bitpit::VolOctree *referencePatch, bitpit::VolOctree *mappedPatch, MPI_Comm communicator)
69  : VolumeMapper(referencePatch, mappedPatch, communicator)
70 #else

72  : VolumeMapper(referencePatch, mappedPatch)
73 #endif

81 void VolOctreeMapper::clearPartitionMapping()
82 {
83  m_partitionIR.clear();

89 void VolOctreeMapper::clearPartitionMappingLists()
90 {
91  m_partitionIR.clearLists();

94 
106 void VolOctreeMapper::adaptionPrepare(const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionInfo, bool reference)
107 {
108  m_previousMapping.clear();
109  PiercedStorage<mapping::Info> *pmapper;
110 
111  if (reference) {
112  pmapper = &m_mapping;
113  } else {
114  pmapper = &m_inverseMapping;
115  }
116 
117  m_previousMapping.clear();
118 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
119  m_partitionIR.map_rank_previousMapping.clear();
120 #endif
121  for (const adaption::Info &info : adaptionInfo) {
122  if (info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_PARTITION_SEND ||
123  info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_PARTITION_RECV ||
124  info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_PARTITION_NOTICE) {
125  throw std::runtime_error ("Mapper: type of adation not supported : " + std::to_string(info.type));
126  } else {
127  if (info.type != adaption::Type::TYPE_DELETION && info.type != adaption::Type::TYPE_CREATION) {
128  for (long id : info.previous) {
129  m_previousMapping[id] = (*pmapper).at(id);
130  }
131  }
132  }
133  }
134 }
135 
151 void VolOctreeMapper::adaptionAlter(const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionInfo, bool reference, bool inverseFilled)
152 {
153  if (reference) {
154  _mappingAdaptionReferenceUpdate(adaptionInfo, inverseFilled);
155  } else {
156  _mappingAdaptionMappedUpdate(adaptionInfo);
157  }
158 }
159 
163 void VolOctreeMapper::adaptionCleanup()
164 {
165  m_previousMapping.clear();
166 }
167 
178 void VolOctreeMapper::_mappingAdaptionReferenceUpdate(const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionInfo, bool inverseFilled)
179 {
180  VolOctree *adaptedPatch = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_referencePatch);
181  VolOctree *mappedPatch = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_mappedPatch);
182 
183  PiercedStorage<mapping::Info> *mappingAdapted = &m_mapping;
184  PiercedStorage<mapping::Info> *mappingMapped = &m_inverseMapping;
185 
186  bool changedPartition = false;
187 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
188  bool checkPart = true;
189  checkPart = checkPartition();
190  if (!checkPart) {
191  changedPartition = _recoverPartition();
192  }
193 #endif
194 
195  if (!changedPartition) {
196  for (const adaption::Info &info : adaptionInfo) {
197  if (info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_PARTITION_SEND ||
198  info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_PARTITION_RECV ||
199  info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_PARTITION_NOTICE) {
200  throw std::runtime_error ("Mapper: type of adation not supported : " + std::to_string(info.type));
201  } else if (info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_DELETION ||
202  info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_CREATION) {
203  // Do nothing
204  } else {
205  if (inverseFilled) {
206  // Erase previous id in mappingMapped elements
207  for (long idprevious : info.previous) {
208  const std::vector<long> &mappedIds = m_previousMapping[idprevious].ids;
209 
210  std::size_t imapped = 0;
211  for (long idp : mappedIds) {
212 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
213  if (checkPart || m_previousMapping[idprevious].ranks[imapped] == m_rank) {
214 #endif
215  std::vector<long>::iterator it = std::find((*mappingMapped)[idp].ids.begin(), (*mappingMapped)[idp].ids.end(), idprevious);
216  if (it != (*mappingMapped)[idp].ids.end()) {
217  (*mappingMapped)[idp].ids.erase(it);
218 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
219  int dist = std::distance((*mappingMapped)[idp].ids.begin(), it);
220  (*mappingMapped)[idp].ranks.erase((*mappingMapped)[idp].ranks.begin()+dist);
221 #endif
222  }
223 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
224  } else {
225  mapping::Info &inverseMappingInfo = m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[m_previousMapping[idprevious].ranks[imapped]][idp];
226  std::vector<long>::iterator it = std::find(inverseMappingInfo.ids.begin(), inverseMappingInfo.ids.end(), idprevious);
227  if (it != inverseMappingInfo.ids.end()) {
228  int dist = std::distance(inverseMappingInfo.ids.begin(), it);
229  inverseMappingInfo.ids.erase(it);
230  inverseMappingInfo.ranks.erase(inverseMappingInfo.ranks.begin() + dist);
231  }
232  }
233 #endif
234  imapped++;
235  }
236  }
237  }
238 
239  switch(info.type) {
240 
241  // Renumbering
242  case adaption::Type::TYPE_RENUMBERING:
243  {
244  long id = info.current[0];
245  mapping::Info &mappingInfo = (*mappingAdapted)[id];
246 
247  mappingInfo.ids.clear();
248  mappingInfo.type = m_previousMapping[info.previous[0]].type;
249  mappingInfo.entity = mapping::Entity::ENTITY_CELL;
250  mappingInfo.ids = m_previousMapping[info.previous[0]].ids;
251 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
252  mappingInfo.ranks = m_previousMapping[info.previous[0]].ranks;
253 #endif
254 
255  if (inverseFilled) {
256  const std::vector<long> &mappedIds = mappingInfo.ids;
257 
258  std::size_t imapped = 0;
259  for (long idp : mappedIds) {
260 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
261  if (checkPart || mappingInfo.ranks[imapped] == m_rank) {
262 #endif
263  (*mappingMapped)[idp].ids.push_back(id);
264 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
265  (*mappingMapped)[idp].ranks.push_back(info.rank);
266  } else {
267  mapping::Info &inverseMappingInfo = m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[mappingInfo.ranks[imapped]][idp];
268  inverseMappingInfo.ids.push_back(id);
269  inverseMappingInfo.ranks.push_back(info.rank);
270  }
271 #endif
272  imapped++;
273  }
274  }
275  }
276  break;
277 
278  // Refinement and coarsening
279  case adaption::Type::TYPE_REFINEMENT:
280  case adaption::Type::TYPE_COARSENING:
281 
282  // Clear current mapper
283  for (long id : info.current) {
284  mapping::Info &mappingInfo = (*mappingAdapted)[id];
285 
286  mappingInfo.ids.clear();
287 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
288  mappingInfo.ranks.clear();
289 #endif
290 
291  mappingInfo.entity = mapping::Entity::ENTITY_CELL;
292  }
293 
294  for (long idprevious : info.previous) {
295  const std::vector<long> &mappedIds = m_previousMapping[idprevious].ids;
296 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
297  const std::vector<int> &mappedRanks = m_previousMapping[idprevious].ranks;
298 #endif
299 
300  std::size_t imapped = 0;
301  for (long mappedId : mappedIds) {
302  VolOctree::OctantInfo oinfoprev;
303  Octant * octm ;
304  uint64_t mortonmapped;
305  uint64_t mortonlastdescmapped;
306  uint8_t levelmapped;
307 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
308  int mappedRank;
309  if (checkPart || mappedRanks[imapped] == m_rank) {
310 #endif
311  oinfoprev = mappedPatch->getCellOctant(mappedId);
312  octm = mappedPatch->getOctantPointer(oinfoprev);
313  mortonmapped = mappedPatch->getTree().getMorton(octm);
314  mortonlastdescmapped = mappedPatch->getTree().getLastDescMorton(octm);
315  levelmapped = mappedPatch->getCellLevel(mappedId);
316 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
317  mappedRank = mappedRanks[imapped];
318  } else {
319  OctantIR *poct = m_partitionIR.map_rank_rec_octantIR[mappedRanks[imapped]][mappedId];
320  octm = &poct->octant;
321  mortonmapped = mappedPatch->getTree().getMorton(&poct->octant);
322  mortonlastdescmapped = mappedPatch->getTree().getLastDescMorton(&poct->octant);
323  levelmapped = mappedPatch->getTree().getLevel(&poct->octant);
324  mappedRank = mappedRanks[imapped];
325  }
326 #endif
327 
328  for (long id : info.current) {
329  // Retrieve level of current cell
330  uint8_t level;
331  uint64_t morton, mortonlastdesc;
332  level = adaptedPatch->getCellLevel(id);
333  VolOctree::OctantInfo octantIfo = adaptedPatch->getCellOctant(id);
334  Octant *octant = adaptedPatch->getOctantPointer(octantIfo);
335  morton = adaptedPatch->getTree().getMorton(octant);
336  mortonlastdesc = adaptedPatch->getTree().getLastDescMorton(octant);
337 
338  bool checkmorton = false;
339 
340  checkmorton |= (morton >= mortonmapped && mortonlastdesc <= mortonlastdescmapped);
341  checkmorton |= (morton <= mortonmapped && mortonlastdesc >= mortonlastdescmapped);
342 
343  if (checkmorton) {
344  if (level == levelmapped) {
345  mapping::Info &mappingInfo = (*mappingAdapted)[id];
346  if (mappingInfo.ids.size() == 0) {
347  mappingInfo.type = mapping::Type::TYPE_RENUMBERING;
348  mappingInfo.ids.push_back(mappedId);
349 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
350  mappingInfo.ranks.push_back(mappedRank);
351 #endif
352  }
353 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
354  if (inverseFilled) {
355  if (checkPart || mappedRank == m_rank) {
356 #endif
357  (*mappingMapped)[mappedId].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_RENUMBERING;
358  (*mappingMapped)[mappedId].ids.clear();
359  (*mappingMapped)[mappedId].ids.push_back(id);
360 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
361  (*mappingMapped)[mappedId].ranks.push_back(info.rank);
362  } else {
363  mapping::Info &inverseMappingInfo = m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[mappedRank][mappedId];
364  inverseMappingInfo.type = mapping::Type::TYPE_RENUMBERING;
365  inverseMappingInfo.ids.push_back(id);
366  inverseMappingInfo.ranks.push_back(info.rank);
367  }
368  }
369 #endif
370  }
371  else if (level > levelmapped) {
372  mapping::Info &mappingInfo = (*mappingAdapted)[id];
373  if (mappingInfo.ids.size() == 0) {
374  mappingInfo.type = mapping::Type::TYPE_REFINEMENT;
375  mappingInfo.ids.push_back(mappedId);
376 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
377  mappingInfo.ranks.push_back(mappedRank);
378 #endif
379  }
380 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
381  if (inverseFilled) {
382  if (checkPart || mappedRank == m_rank) {
383 #endif
384  if (std::find((*mappingMapped)[mappedId].ids.begin(), (*mappingMapped)[mappedId].ids.end(), id) == (*mappingMapped)[mappedId].ids.end()) {
385  (*mappingMapped)[mappedId].ids.push_back(id);
386  (*mappingMapped)[mappedId].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_COARSENING;
387 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
388  (*mappingMapped)[mappedId].ranks.push_back(info.rank);
389 #endif
390  }
391 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
392  } else {
393  mapping::Info &inverseMappingInfo = m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[mappedRank][mappedId];
394  inverseMappingInfo.type = mapping::Type::TYPE_COARSENING;
395  inverseMappingInfo.ids.push_back(id);
396  inverseMappingInfo.ranks.push_back(info.rank);
397  }
398  }
399 #endif
400  } else if (level < levelmapped) {
401  mapping::Info &mappingInfo = (*mappingAdapted)[id];
402  if (std::find(mappingInfo.ids.begin(), mappingInfo.ids.end(), mappedId) == mappingInfo.ids.end()) {
403  mappingInfo.type = mapping::Type::TYPE_COARSENING;
404  mappingInfo.ids.push_back(mappedId);
405 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
406  mappingInfo.ranks.push_back(mappedRank);
407 #endif
408  }
409 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
410  if (inverseFilled) {
411  if (checkPart || mappedRank == m_rank ) {
412 #endif
413  if ((*mappingMapped)[mappedId].ids.size() == 0) {
414  (*mappingMapped)[mappedId].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_REFINEMENT;
415  (*mappingMapped)[mappedId].ids.push_back(id);
416 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
417  (*mappingMapped)[mappedId].ranks.push_back(info.rank);
418 #endif
419  }
420 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
421  } else {
422  mapping::Info &inverseMappingInfo = m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[mappedRank][mappedId];
423  if (inverseMappingInfo.ids.size() == 0) {
424  inverseMappingInfo.type = mapping::Type::TYPE_REFINEMENT;
425  inverseMappingInfo.ids.push_back(id);
426  inverseMappingInfo.ranks.push_back(info.rank);
427  }
428  }
429  }
430 #endif
431  } // End level < levelreference
432  } // End checkmorton
433  } // End id current
434 
435  imapped++;
436  } // End idmapped
437  } // End idprevious
438  break;
439 
440  // Default
441  default:
442  break;
443 
444  } // End switch
445  } // End if deletion
446  } // End end info
447 
448 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
449  if (inverseFilled) {
450  _communicateInverseMapperBack();
451  }
452 #endif
453  } else {
454  initialize(inverseFilled);
455  }
456 }
457 
464 void VolOctreeMapper::_mappingAdaptionMappedUpdate(const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionInfo)
465 {
466  VolOctree *adaptedPatch = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_mappedPatch);
467  VolOctree *referencePatch = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_referencePatch);
468 
469  PiercedStorage<mapping::Info> *mappingAdapted = &m_inverseMapping;
470  PiercedStorage<mapping::Info> *mappingReference = &m_mapping;
471 
472  bool changedPartition = false;
473 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
474  bool checkPart = true;
475  checkPart = checkPartition();
476  if (!checkPart) {
477  changedPartition = _recoverPartition();
478  }
479 #endif
480 
481  if (!m_inverseMapping.getKernel()) {
482  throw std::runtime_error("Updating mapping with adaption of mapped mesh possible only if inverse mapper is filled");
483  }
484 
485  if (!changedPartition) {
486  std::vector<adaption::Info> adaptionInfoRef;
487 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
488  if (!checkPart) {
489  _communicateMappedAdaptionInfo(adaptionInfo, &adaptionInfoRef);
490  } else {
491  adaptionInfoRef = adaptionInfo;
492  }
493 #else
494  adaptionInfoRef = adaptionInfo;
495 #endif
496 
497  for (const adaption::Info &info : adaptionInfoRef) {
498  if (info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_PARTITION_SEND ||
499  info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_PARTITION_RECV ||
500  info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_PARTITION_NOTICE) {
501  throw std::runtime_error ("Mapper: type of adation not supported : " + std::to_string(info.type));
502  } else if (info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_DELETION ||
503  info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_CREATION) {
504  // Do nothing
505  } else {
506  // Erase previous id in mappingReference elements
507  for (long idprevious : info.previous) {
508  std::vector<long> *mappedIds;
509 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
510  if (checkPart || info.rank == m_rank) {
511 #endif
512  mappedIds = &(m_previousMapping[idprevious].ids);
513 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
514  } else {
515  mappedIds = &(m_partitionIR.map_rank_previousMapping[info.rank][idprevious].ids);
516  }
517 #endif
518  for (long idp : *mappedIds) {
519  std::vector<long>::iterator it = std::find((*mappingReference)[idp].ids.begin(), (*mappingReference)[idp].ids.end(), idprevious);
520  if (it != (*mappingReference)[idp].ids.end()) {
521  (*mappingReference)[idp].ids.erase(it);
522 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
523  int dist = std::distance((*mappingReference)[idp].ids.begin(), it);
524  (*mappingReference)[idp].ranks.erase((*mappingReference)[idp].ranks.begin()+dist);
525 #endif
526  }
527  }
528  }
529 
530  // Renumbering
531  if (info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_RENUMBERING) {
532  long id = info.current[0];
533  mapping::Info &mappingInfo = (*mappingAdapted)[id];
534 
535  std::vector<long> *mappedIds;
536 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
537  if (checkPart || info.rank == m_rank) {
538 #endif
539  mappingInfo.ids.clear();
540  mappingInfo.type = m_previousMapping[info.previous[0]].type;
541  mappingInfo.entity = mapping::Entity::ENTITY_CELL;
542  mappingInfo.ids = m_previousMapping[info.previous[0]].ids;
543  mappedIds = &(mappingInfo.ids);
544 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
545  mappingInfo.ranks = m_previousMapping[info.previous[0]].ranks;
546  } else {
547  for (long _idp : info.previous) {
548  if (m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank].count(_idp)) {
549  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank].erase(_idp);
550  }
551  }
552 
553  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ids.clear();
554  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].type = m_partitionIR.map_rank_previousMapping[info.rank][info.previous[0]].type;
555  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].entity = mapping::Entity::ENTITY_CELL;
556  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ids = m_partitionIR.map_rank_previousMapping[info.rank][info.previous[0]].ids;
557  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ranks = m_partitionIR.map_rank_previousMapping[info.rank][info.previous[0]].ranks;
558  mappedIds = &(m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ids);
559  }
560 #endif
561  for (long idp : *mappedIds) {
562  (*mappingReference)[idp].ids.push_back(id);
563 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
564  (*mappingReference)[idp].ranks.push_back(info.rank);
565 #endif
566  }
567  }
568 
569  // Refinement and coarsening
570  if (info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_REFINEMENT || info.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_COARSENING) {
571  // Clear current mapper
572  for (long id : info.current) {
573 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
574  if (checkPart || info.rank == m_rank) {
575 #endif
576  mapping::Info &mappingInfo = (*mappingAdapted)[id];
577  mappingInfo.ids.clear();
578  mappingInfo.entity = mapping::Entity::ENTITY_CELL;
579 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
580  mappingInfo.ranks.clear();
581  } else {
582  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ids.clear();
583  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ranks.clear();
584  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].entity = mapping::Entity::ENTITY_CELL;
585  }
586 #endif
587  }
588 
589  for (long idprevious : info.previous) {
590  std::vector<long> *mappedIds;
591  std::vector<int> *mappedRanks;
592 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
593  if (checkPart || info.rank == m_rank) {
594 #endif
595  mappedIds = &(m_previousMapping[idprevious].ids);
596 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
597  mappedRanks = &(m_previousMapping[idprevious].ranks);
598  } else {
599  mappedIds = &(m_partitionIR.map_rank_previousMapping[info.rank][idprevious].ids);
600  mappedRanks = &(m_partitionIR.map_rank_previousMapping[info.rank][idprevious].ranks);
601  }
602 #endif
603  std::size_t icount = 0;
604  for (long mappedId : *mappedIds) {
605  VolOctree::OctantInfo oinfoprev = referencePatch->getCellOctant(mappedId);
606  const Octant *octant = referencePatch->getOctantPointer(oinfoprev);
607  uint64_t mortonreference = referencePatch->getTree().getMorton(octant);
608  uint64_t mortonlastdescreference = referencePatch->getTree().getLastDescMorton(octant);
609  uint8_t levelreference = referencePatch->getCellLevel(mappedId);
610 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
611  // IT'S ALWAYS = m_rank?!...
612  int mappedRank = (*mappedRanks)[icount];
613 #endif
614  for (long id : info.current) {
615  // Retrieve level of current cell
616  uint8_t level;
617  uint64_t morton, mortonlastdesc;
618 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
619  if (checkPart || info.rank == m_rank) {
620 #endif
621  level = adaptedPatch->getCellLevel(id);
622  VolOctree::OctantInfo octantIfo = adaptedPatch->getCellOctant(id);
623  const Octant *octant = adaptedPatch->getOctantPointer(octantIfo);
624  morton = adaptedPatch->getTree().getMorton(octant);
625  mortonlastdesc = adaptedPatch->getTree().getLastDescMorton(octant);
626 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
627  } else {
628  OctantIR *octantIR = m_partitionIR.map_rank_rec_octantIR[info.rank][id];
629  level = octantIR->octant.getLevel();
630  morton = adaptedPatch->getTree().getMorton(&octantIR->octant);
631  mortonlastdesc = adaptedPatch->getTree().getLastDescMorton(&octantIR->octant);
632  }
633 #endif
634 
635  bool checkmorton = false;
636 
637  checkmorton |= (morton >= mortonreference && mortonlastdesc <= mortonlastdescreference);
638  checkmorton |= (morton <= mortonreference && mortonlastdesc >= mortonlastdescreference);
639 
640  if (checkmorton) {
641 
642  if (level == levelreference) {
643 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
644  if (checkPart || info.rank == m_rank) {
645 #endif
646  mapping::Info &mappingInfo = (*mappingAdapted)[id];
647  if (mappingInfo.ids.size() == 0) {
648  mappingInfo.type = mapping::Type::TYPE_RENUMBERING;
649  mappingInfo.ids.push_back(mappedId);
650 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
651  mappingInfo.ranks.push_back(info.rank);
652 #endif
653  }
654 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
655  } else {
656  if (m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ids.size() == 0) {
657  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_RENUMBERING;
658  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ids.push_back(mappedId);
659  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ranks.push_back(mappedRank);
660  }
661  }
662 #endif
663  (*mappingReference)[mappedId].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_RENUMBERING;
664  (*mappingReference)[mappedId].ids.clear();
665  (*mappingReference)[mappedId].ids.push_back(id);
666 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
667  (*mappingReference)[mappedId].ranks.push_back(info.rank);
668 #endif
669  } else if (level > levelreference) {
670 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
671  if (checkPart || info.rank == m_rank) {
672 #endif
673  mapping::Info &mappingInfo = (*mappingAdapted)[id];
674  if (mappingInfo.ids.size() == 0) {
675  mappingInfo.type = mapping::Type::TYPE_REFINEMENT;
676  mappingInfo.ids.push_back(mappedId);
677 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
678  mappingInfo.ranks.push_back(mappedRank);
679 #endif
680  }
681 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
682  } else {
683  if (m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ids.size() == 0) {
684  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_REFINEMENT;
685  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ids.push_back(mappedId);
686  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ranks.push_back(mappedRank);
687  }
688  }
689 #endif
690  if (std::find((*mappingReference)[mappedId].ids.begin(), (*mappingReference)[mappedId].ids.end(), id) == (*mappingReference)[mappedId].ids.end()) {
691  (*mappingReference)[mappedId].ids.push_back(id);
692  (*mappingReference)[mappedId].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_COARSENING;
693 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
694  (*mappingReference)[mappedId].ranks.push_back(info.rank);
695 #endif
696  }
697  } else if (level < levelreference) {
698 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
699  if (checkPart || info.rank == m_rank) {
700 #endif
701  mapping::Info &mappingInfo = (*mappingAdapted)[id];
702  if (std::find(mappingInfo.ids.begin(), mappingInfo.ids.end(), mappedId) == mappingInfo.ids.end()) {
703  mappingInfo.type = mapping::Type::TYPE_COARSENING;
704  mappingInfo.ids.push_back(mappedId);
705 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
706  mappingInfo.ranks.push_back(mappedRank);
707 #endif
708  }
709 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
710  } else {
711  if (std::find(m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ids.begin(), m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ids.end(), mappedId) == m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ids.end()) {
712  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_COARSENING;
713  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ids.push_back(mappedId);
714  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[info.rank][id].ranks.push_back(mappedRank);
715  }
716  }
717 #endif
718  if ((*mappingReference)[mappedId].ids.size() == 0) {
719  (*mappingReference)[mappedId].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_REFINEMENT;
720  (*mappingReference)[mappedId].ids.push_back(id);
721 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
722  (*mappingReference)[mappedId].ranks.push_back(info.rank);
723 #endif
724  }
725  } // End level < levelreference
726  } // End checkmorton
727  } // End id current
728 
729  icount++;
730  } // Enf idmapped
731  } // End idprevious
732  }
733  } // End if deletion
734  } // End info
735 
736 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
737  _communicateInverseMapperBack();
738 #endif
739 
740  } else {
741  initialize(true);
742  }
743 }
744 
745 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
754 std::map<int, std::vector<long>> VolOctreeMapper::getReceivedMappedIds()
755 {
756  std::map<int, std::vector<long>> received;
757 
758  for (OctantIR octir : m_partitionIR.list_rec_octantIR_before) {
759  received[octir.rank].push_back(octir.id);
760  }
761 
762  for (OctantIR octir : m_partitionIR.list_rec_octantIR_after) {
763  received[octir.rank].push_back(octir.id);
764  }
765 
766  return received;
767 }
768 
777 std::map<int, std::vector<long>> VolOctreeMapper::getSentReferenceIds()
778 {
779  std::map<int, std::vector<long>> sent;
780 
781  // Recover id to be recv/send
782  std::map<int, std::set<long>> rankIdSend;
783 
784  for (Cell &cell : m_referencePatch->getCells()) {
785  long id = cell.getId();
786  auto info = m_mapping[id];
787  for (int rank : info.ranks) {
788  if (rank != m_referencePatch->getRank()) {
789  rankIdSend[rank].insert(id);
790  }
791  }
792  }
793 
794  for (int rank = 0; rank < m_nProcs; rank++) {
795  sent[rank].reserve(rankIdSend[rank].size());
796  }
797 
798  for (std::map<int, std::set<long>>::iterator it=rankIdSend.begin(); it!=rankIdSend.end(); ++it) {
799  for (long id : it->second) {
800  sent[it->first].push_back(id);
801  }
802  }
803 
804  return sent;
805 }
806 
815 std::map<int, std::vector<long>> VolOctreeMapper::getSentMappedIds()
816 {
817  std::map<int, std::vector<long>> sent;
818 
819  for (OctantIR octir : m_partitionIR.list_sent_octantIR) {
820  sent[octir.rank].push_back(octir.id);
821  }
822 
823  return sent;
824 }
825 
826 #endif
827 
837 void VolOctreeMapper::_mapMeshes(bool fillInverse)
838 {
839  std::array<double,3> originR = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_referencePatch)->getOrigin();
840  std::array<double,3> originM = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_mappedPatch)->getOrigin();
841 
842  if (!(utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()(static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_referencePatch)->getLength(),static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_mappedPatch)->getLength()))
843  || !(utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()(originR[0],originM[0]))
844  || !(utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()(originR[1],originM[1]))
845  || !(utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()(originR[2],originM[2]))) {
846  throw std::runtime_error ("mesh mapper: different domain of VolOctree meshes not allowed.");
847  }
848 
849 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
850  clearPartitionMapping();
851 #endif
852 
853  m_mapping.setDynamicKernel(&m_referencePatch->getCells(), PiercedSyncMaster::SyncMode::SYNC_MODE_JOURNALED);
854  if (fillInverse) {
855  m_inverseMapping.setDynamicKernel(&m_mappedPatch->getCells(), PiercedSyncMaster::SyncMode::SYNC_MODE_JOURNALED);
856  } else {
857  clearInverseMapping();
858  }
859 
860 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
861  if (!(m_referencePatch->isPartitioned())) {
862 #endif
863  long indRef = 0;
864  _mapMeshesSamePartition(nullptr, nullptr, fillInverse, &indRef);
865 
866 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
867  } else {
868  bool checkPart = checkPartition();
869  if (checkPart) {
870  long indRef = 0;
871  _mapMeshesSamePartition(nullptr, nullptr, fillInverse, &indRef);
872  } else {
873  _mapMeshPartitioned(fillInverse);
874  }
875  }
876 #endif
877 }
878 
896 void VolOctreeMapper::_mapMeshesSamePartition(const std::vector<OctantIR> *octantsIRReference, const std::vector<OctantIR> *octantsIRMapped,
897  bool fillInverse, long *indRef)
898 {
899  bitpit::VolOctree *referencePatch = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_referencePatch);
900  bitpit::VolOctree *mappedPatch = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_mappedPatch);
901 
902  // Fill IR with meshes if list pointer is null
903 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
904  bool localMapped = false;
905 #endif
906 
907  std::vector<OctantIR> tempOctantsIRReference;
908  if (!octantsIRReference) {
909  long n = referencePatch->getInternalCellCount();
910  tempOctantsIRReference.reserve(n);
911  for (long i = 0; i < n; i++) {
912  VolOctree::OctantInfo octantIfoRef(i, true);
913  const Octant *octRef = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_referencePatch)->getOctantPointer(octantIfoRef);
914  long idRef = referencePatch->getOctantId(octantIfoRef);
915 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
916  tempOctantsIRReference.emplace_back(*octRef, idRef, idRef, m_rank);
917 #else
918  tempOctantsIRReference.emplace_back(*octRef, idRef, idRef);
919 #endif
920  }
921  octantsIRReference = &tempOctantsIRReference;
922  }
923 
924  std::vector<OctantIR> tempOctantsIRMapped;
925  if (!octantsIRMapped) {
926  long n = mappedPatch->getInternalCellCount();
927  tempOctantsIRMapped.reserve(n);
928  for (long i = 0; i < n; i++) {
929  VolOctree::OctantInfo octantIfoMap(i, true);
930  const Octant *octMap = mappedPatch->getOctantPointer(octantIfoMap);
931  long idMap = mappedPatch->getOctantId(octantIfoMap);
932 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
933  tempOctantsIRMapped.emplace_back(*octMap, idMap, idMap, m_rank);
934 #else
935  tempOctantsIRMapped.emplace_back(*octMap, idMap, idMap);
936 #endif
937  }
938  octantsIRMapped = &tempOctantsIRMapped;
939 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
940  localMapped = true;
941 #endif
942  }
943 
944  // Define a map for inverse mapper structure
945  //
946  // If serial the map is transfer to inverse mapper directly.
947  //
948  // If mapped mesh is parallel and partitioned the map object is
949  // communicated at the end of the procedure.
950  long nRef = octantsIRReference->size();
951  long nMap = octantsIRMapped->size();
952 
953  long indMap = 0;
954  if (*indRef < nRef && nMap > 0) {
955  // Place indMap at first last desc morton greater than first morton of
956  // reference octants
957  uint64_t morton = referencePatch->getTree().getMorton(&octantsIRReference->at(*indRef).octant);
958 
959  uint64_t mortonMapLastdesc;
960  for (indMap = 0; indMap < nMap; ++indMap) {
961  mortonMapLastdesc = mappedPatch->getTree().getLastDescMorton(&octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).octant);
962  if (mortonMapLastdesc >= morton) {
963  break;
964  }
965  }
966  }
967 
968  std::unordered_map<long, mapping::Info> inverseGlobalMapping;
969  while (*indRef < nRef && indMap < nMap) {
970  long idRef = octantsIRReference->at(*indRef).id;
971  long idMap = octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).id;
972  long gidMap = octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).globalId;
973 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
974  int rank = octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).rank;
975 #endif
976 
977  m_mapping[idRef].entity = mapping::Entity::ENTITY_CELL;
978  if (fillInverse) {
979  inverseGlobalMapping[gidMap].entity = mapping::Entity::ENTITY_CELL;
980  }
981 
982  if (octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).octant.getLevel() == octantsIRReference->at(*indRef).octant.getLevel()) {
983  m_mapping[idRef].ids.push_back(idMap);
984  m_mapping[idRef].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_RENUMBERING;
985 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
986  m_mapping[idRef].ranks.push_back(rank);
987 #endif
988  if (fillInverse) {
989  inverseGlobalMapping[gidMap].ids.push_back(idRef);
990  inverseGlobalMapping[gidMap].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_RENUMBERING;
991 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
992  inverseGlobalMapping[gidMap].ranks.push_back(m_rank);
993 #endif
994  }
995  (*indRef)++;
996  indMap++;
997  }
998  else if (octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).octant.getLevel() > octantsIRReference->at(*indRef).octant.getLevel()) {
999  m_mapping[idRef].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_COARSENING;
1000 
1001  uint64_t mortonlastdesc = referencePatch->getTree().getLastDescMorton(&octantsIRReference->at(*indRef).octant);
1002  uint64_t mortonMap = mappedPatch->getTree().getMorton(&octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).octant);
1003  uint64_t mortonMapLastDesc = mappedPatch->getTree().getLastDescMorton(&octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).octant);
1004  while(mortonMap <= mortonlastdesc) {
1005  m_mapping[idRef].ids.push_back(idMap);
1006 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
1007  m_mapping[idRef].ranks.push_back(rank);
1008 #endif
1009  if (fillInverse) {
1010  inverseGlobalMapping[gidMap].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_REFINEMENT;
1011  inverseGlobalMapping[gidMap].ids.push_back(idRef);
1012 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
1013  inverseGlobalMapping[gidMap].ranks.push_back(m_rank);
1014 #endif
1015  }
1016  indMap++;
1017  if (indMap == nMap) {
1018  break;
1019  }
1020  idMap = octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).id;
1021  gidMap = octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).globalId;
1022 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
1023  rank = octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).rank;
1024 #endif
1025  mortonMap = mappedPatch->getTree().getMorton(&octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).octant);
1026  mortonMapLastDesc = mappedPatch->getTree().getLastDescMorton(&octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).octant);
1027  }
1028  if (mortonMapLastDesc >= mortonlastdesc) {
1029  (*indRef)++;
1030  }
1031  }
1032  else if (octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).octant.getLevel() < octantsIRReference->at(*indRef).octant.getLevel()) {
1033 
1034  uint64_t morton = referencePatch->getTree().getMorton(&octantsIRReference->at(*indRef).octant);
1035  uint64_t mortonlastdescmesh = mappedPatch->getTree().getLastDescMorton(&octantsIRMapped->at(indMap).octant);
1036 
1037  if (fillInverse) {
1038  inverseGlobalMapping[gidMap].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_COARSENING;
1039  }
1040 
1041  while (morton <= mortonlastdescmesh) {
1042  m_mapping[idRef].type = mapping::Type::TYPE_REFINEMENT;
1043  m_mapping[idRef].ids.push_back(idMap);
1044 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
1045  m_mapping[idRef].ranks.push_back(rank);
1046 #endif
1047  if (fillInverse) {
1048  inverseGlobalMapping[gidMap].ids.push_back(idRef);
1049 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
1050  inverseGlobalMapping[gidMap].ranks.push_back(m_rank);
1051 #endif
1052  }
1053  (*indRef)++;
1054  if (*indRef == nRef) {
1055  break;
1056  }
1057  morton = referencePatch->getTree().getMorton(&octantsIRReference->at(*indRef).octant);
1058  idRef = octantsIRReference->at(*indRef).id;
1059  }
1060  indMap++;
1061  }
1062  }
1063 
1064  // Fill inverse mapping
1065  if (fillInverse) {
1066  std::unordered_map<long, mapping::Info> inverseLocalMapping;
1067 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
1068  if (mappedPatch->isPartitioned() && !localMapped && !checkPartition()) {
1069  _communicateInverseMapper(octantsIRMapped, inverseGlobalMapping, &inverseLocalMapping);
1070  } else {
1071  inverseGlobalMapping.swap(inverseLocalMapping);
1072  }
1073 #else
1074  inverseGlobalMapping.swap(inverseLocalMapping);
1075 #endif
1076 
1077  for (const auto &mappingEntry : inverseLocalMapping) {
1078  m_inverseMapping[mappingEntry.first].type = mappingEntry.second.type;
1079  for (long inverseMappedId : mappingEntry.second.ids){
1080  m_inverseMapping[mappingEntry.first].ids.push_back(inverseMappedId);
1081  }
1082 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
1083  for (int inverseMappedRank : mappingEntry.second.ranks){
1084  m_inverseMapping[mappingEntry.first].ranks.push_back(inverseMappedRank);
1085  }
1086 #endif
1087  }
1088  }
1089 }
1090 
1091 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
1099 bool VolOctreeMapper::checkPartition()
1100 {
1101  std::vector<uint64_t> partitionMapped = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_mappedPatch)->getTree().getPartitionLastDesc();
1102  std::vector<uint64_t> partitionReference = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_referencePatch)->getTree().getPartitionLastDesc();
1103  for (int rank = 0; rank < m_nProcs; ++rank) {
1104  if (partitionReference[rank] != partitionMapped[rank]) {
1105  return false;
1106  }
1107  }
1108 
1109  return true;
1110 }
1111 
1118 void VolOctreeMapper::_mapMeshPartitioned(bool fillInverse)
1119 {
1120  _recoverPartition();
1121 
1122  // Fill IR with reference mesh
1123  //
1124  // TODO: make a method to do that
1125  long n = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_referencePatch)->getInternalCellCount();
1126  std::vector<OctantIR> octantsIRReference;
1127  octantsIRReference.reserve(n);
1128  for (long i = 0; i < n; i++) {
1129  VolOctree::OctantInfo octantIfoRef(i, true);
1130  const Octant *octRef = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_referencePatch)->getOctantPointer(octantIfoRef);
1131  long idRef = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_referencePatch)->getOctantId(octantIfoRef);
1132  octantsIRReference.emplace_back(*octRef, idRef, idRef, m_rank);
1133  }
1134 
1135  long indRef = 0;
1136  _mapMeshesSamePartition(&octantsIRReference, &m_partitionIR.list_rec_octantIR_before, fillInverse, &indRef);
1137  _mapMeshesSamePartition(&octantsIRReference, nullptr, fillInverse, &indRef);
1138  _mapMeshesSamePartition(&octantsIRReference, &m_partitionIR.list_rec_octantIR_after, fillInverse, &indRef);
1139 }
1140 
1147 bool VolOctreeMapper::_recoverPartition()
1148 {
1149  // Now the mapped mesh is repartitioned (is copied...) over the processes
1150  // to match the partitioning between the two meshes
1151 
1152  // Find owner of reference partition over mapped mesh partition
1153  VolOctree* referencePatch = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_referencePatch);
1154  VolOctree* mappedPatch = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_mappedPatch);
1155  std::vector<uint64_t> partitionLDReference = referencePatch->getTree().getPartitionLastDesc();
1156  std::vector<uint64_t> partitionLDMapped = mappedPatch->getTree().getPartitionLastDesc();
1157  std::vector<uint64_t> partitionFDReference = referencePatch->getTree().getPartitionFirstDesc();
1158  std::vector<uint64_t> partitionFDMapped = mappedPatch->getTree().getPartitionFirstDesc();
1159 
1160  if (m_partitionIR.partitionFDReference.size() != 0) {
1161  if (m_partitionIR.partitionFDMapped != partitionFDMapped ||
1162  m_partitionIR.partitionLDMapped != partitionLDMapped ||
1163  m_partitionIR.partitionFDReference != partitionFDReference ||
1164  m_partitionIR.partitionLDReference != partitionLDReference) {
1165  m_partitionIR.partitionFDReference.clear();
1166  m_partitionIR.partitionLDReference.clear();
1167  m_partitionIR.partitionFDMapped.clear();
1168  m_partitionIR.partitionLDMapped.clear();
1169  return true;
1170  }
1171  }
1172 
1173  std::map<int, std::vector<int>> frommapped_rank;
1174  std::map<int,std::vector<int>> toreference_rank;
1175  for (int ref_rank = 0; ref_rank < m_nProcs; ref_rank++) {
1176  uint64_t local_first_morton = partitionFDReference[ref_rank];
1177  uint64_t local_last_morton = partitionLDReference[ref_rank];
1178 
1179  for (int irank = 0; irank < m_nProcs; irank++) {
1180  if (irank != ref_rank) {
1181  if (partitionFDMapped[irank] <= local_first_morton && partitionLDMapped[irank] >= local_first_morton) {
1182  frommapped_rank[ref_rank].push_back(irank);
1183  toreference_rank[irank].push_back(ref_rank);
1184  }
1185  else if (partitionFDMapped[irank] <= local_last_morton && partitionLDMapped[irank] >= local_last_morton) {
1186  frommapped_rank[ref_rank].push_back(irank);
1187  toreference_rank[irank].push_back(ref_rank);
1188  }
1189  else if (partitionFDMapped[irank] <= local_first_morton && partitionLDMapped[irank] >= local_last_morton) {
1190  frommapped_rank[ref_rank].push_back(irank);
1191  toreference_rank[irank].push_back(ref_rank);
1192  }
1193  else if (partitionFDMapped[irank] >= local_first_morton && partitionLDMapped[irank] <= local_last_morton) {
1194  frommapped_rank[ref_rank].push_back(irank);
1195  toreference_rank[irank].push_back(ref_rank);
1196  }
1197  }
1198  }
1199  }
1200 
1201  clearPartitionMappingLists();
1202 
1203  // Locally the mapped mesh build the lists of octants to send
1204  std::map<int, std::vector<Octant>> list_octant;
1205  std::map<int, std::vector<long>> list_id;
1206  std::map<int, std::vector<long>> list_globalId;
1207  uint32_t idx = 0;
1208  uint64_t morton = mappedPatch->getTree().getLastDescMorton(idx);
1209  for (int reference_rank : toreference_rank[m_rank]) {
1210  uint64_t reference_first_morton = partitionFDReference[reference_rank];
1211  uint64_t reference_last_morton = partitionLDReference[reference_rank];
1212  while (morton < reference_first_morton) {
1213  idx++;
1214  if (idx == mappedPatch->getTree().getNumOctants()) {
1215  break;
1216  }
1217  morton = mappedPatch->getTree().getLastDescMorton(idx);
1218  }
1219  while (morton < reference_last_morton) {
1220  Octant oct = *mappedPatch->getTree().getOctant(idx);
1221  list_octant[reference_rank].push_back(oct);
1222  VolOctree::OctantInfo octantIfo(idx, true);
1223  long id = mappedPatch->getOctantId(octantIfo);
1224  list_id[reference_rank].push_back(id);
1225  long globalId = mappedPatch->getTree().getGlobalIdx(idx);
1226  list_globalId[reference_rank].push_back(globalId);
1227  m_partitionIR.list_sent_octantIR.emplace_back(oct, id, globalId, reference_rank);
1228  idx++;
1229  if (idx == mappedPatch->getTree().getNumOctants()) {
1230  break;
1231  }
1232  morton = mappedPatch->getTree().getMorton(idx);
1233  }
1234  }
1235 
1236  // Communications
1237  //
1238  // Send local mapped octants to reference rank and receive mapped octants
1239  // from other processes
1240  // Note. The communicated octants have to be ordered by Morton index.
1241  // For this reason the communications must be performed ordered by rank.
1242  std::size_t octantBinarySize = Octant::getBinarySize() + 2 * sizeof(long);
1243 
1244  // Build send buffers
1245  DataCommunicator octCommunicator(m_communicator);
1246 
1247  // Set size
1248  //
1249  // TODO: make accessible global variables in ParaTree
1250  for (int reference_rank : toreference_rank[m_rank]) {
1251  const std::vector<Octant> &rankOctants = list_octant[reference_rank];
1252  std::size_t nRankOctants = rankOctants.size();
1253 
1254  // Set buffer size
1255  std::size_t buffSize = sizeof(std::size_t) + nRankOctants * octantBinarySize;
1256  octCommunicator.setSend(reference_rank,buffSize);
1257 
1258  // Fill buffer with octants
1259  SendBuffer &sendBuffer = octCommunicator.getSendBuffer(reference_rank);
1260  sendBuffer << nRankOctants;
1261  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nRankOctants; ++n) {
1262  const Octant &octant = rankOctants[n];
1263  sendBuffer << octant;
1264 
1265  long id = list_id[reference_rank][n];
1266  sendBuffer << id;
1267 
1268  long globalId = list_globalId[reference_rank][n];
1269  sendBuffer << globalId;
1270  }
1271  }
1272 
1273  octCommunicator.discoverRecvs();
1274  octCommunicator.startAllRecvs();
1275  octCommunicator.startAllSends();
1276 
1277  std::vector<int> recvRanks = octCommunicator.getRecvRanks();
1278  std::sort(recvRanks.begin(),recvRanks.end());
1279 
1280  std::vector<OctantIR> &list_rec_octantIR_before = m_partitionIR.list_rec_octantIR_before;
1281  std::vector<OctantIR> &list_rec_octantIR_after = m_partitionIR.list_rec_octantIR_after;
1282  std::vector<OctantIR> *_list_rec_octantIR;
1283 
1284  list_rec_octantIR_before.clear();
1285  list_rec_octantIR_after.clear();
1286 
1287  for (int rank : recvRanks) {
1288  octCommunicator.waitRecv(rank);
1289 
1290  if (rank < m_rank) {
1291  _list_rec_octantIR = &list_rec_octantIR_before;
1292  } else if (rank > m_rank) {
1293  _list_rec_octantIR = &list_rec_octantIR_after;
1294  } else {
1295  break;
1296  }
1297 
1298  RecvBuffer &recvBuffer = octCommunicator.getRecvBuffer(rank);
1299 
1300  std::size_t nRecvOctants;
1301  recvBuffer >> nRecvOctants;
1302  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nRecvOctants; ++n) {
1303  Octant octant;
1304  recvBuffer >> octant;
1305 
1306  long id;
1307  recvBuffer >> id;
1308 
1309  long globalId;
1310  recvBuffer >> globalId;
1311 
1312  _list_rec_octantIR->emplace_back(octant, id, globalId, rank);
1313  }
1314 
1315  for (OctantIR &octantIR : *_list_rec_octantIR) {
1316  long id = octantIR.id;
1317  m_partitionIR.map_rank_rec_octantIR[rank][id] = &octantIR;
1318  }
1319  }
1320 
1321  octCommunicator.waitAllSends();
1322 
1323  m_partitionIR.partitionLDReference = partitionLDReference;
1324  m_partitionIR.partitionLDMapped = partitionLDMapped;
1325  m_partitionIR.partitionFDReference = partitionFDReference;
1326  m_partitionIR.partitionFDMapped = partitionFDMapped;
1327 
1328  return false;
1329 }
1330 
1338 void VolOctreeMapper::_communicateInverseMapper(const std::vector<OctantIR> *octantsIRMapped,
1339  const std::unordered_map<long, mapping::Info> &inverseGlobalMapping,
1340  std::unordered_map<long, mapping::Info> *inverseLocalMapping)
1341 {
1342  // Recover mapping elements to send (to partitions of mapped mesh)
1343  std::set<int> toRanks;
1344  std::map<int, std::vector<long>> toRankGlobalId;
1345  std::map<long, long > globalIdToId;
1346  for (const OctantIR &octantIR : *octantsIRMapped) {
1347  if (!inverseGlobalMapping.count(octantIR.globalId)){
1348  continue;
1349  }
1350  toRankGlobalId[octantIR.rank].push_back(octantIR.globalId);
1351  globalIdToId[octantIR.globalId] = octantIR.id;
1352  toRanks.insert(octantIR.rank);
1353  }
1354 
1355  // Build send buffers
1356  DataCommunicator mapCommunicator(m_communicator);
1357 
1358  // Set size
1359  for (int rank : toRanks) {
1360  // Get buffer size
1361  std::size_t buffSize = 0;
1362  for (long globalId : toRankGlobalId[rank]) {
1363  const mapping::Info &info = inverseGlobalMapping.at(globalId);
1364  int mappedSize = info.ids.size();
1365  std::size_t infoBytes = std::size_t(sizeof(long) + sizeof(int) + sizeof(int) + sizeof(int) + (sizeof(long))*mappedSize);
1366  buffSize += infoBytes;
1367  }
1368  buffSize += std::size_t(sizeof(int));
1369  mapCommunicator.setSend(rank, buffSize);
1370 
1371  // Fill buffer with octants and local map for inverse mapping
1372  SendBuffer &sendBuffer = mapCommunicator.getSendBuffer(rank);
1373  sendBuffer << int(toRankGlobalId[rank].size());
1374  for (long globalId : toRankGlobalId[rank]) {
1375  const mapping::Info &info = inverseGlobalMapping.at(globalId);
1376  sendBuffer << globalId;
1377  sendBuffer << int(info.type);
1378  sendBuffer << int(info.entity);
1379  int mappedSize = info.ids.size();
1380  sendBuffer << mappedSize;
1381  for (long refId : info.ids) {
1382  sendBuffer << refId;
1383  }
1384 
1385  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[rank][globalIdToId[globalId]] = info;
1386 
1387  }
1388  }
1389 
1390  mapCommunicator.discoverRecvs();
1391  mapCommunicator.startAllRecvs();
1392  mapCommunicator.startAllSends();
1393 
1394  int nCompletedRecvs = 0;
1395  while (nCompletedRecvs < mapCommunicator.getRecvCount()) {
1396  int rank = mapCommunicator.waitAnyRecv();
1397  RecvBuffer &recvBuffer = mapCommunicator.getRecvBuffer(rank);
1398 
1399  int nof;
1400  recvBuffer >> nof;
1401  for (int i = 0; i < nof; i++) {
1402  long globalId;
1403  recvBuffer >> globalId;
1404 
1405  uint32_t idx = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_mappedPatch)->getTree().getLocalIdx(globalId);
1406  VolOctree::OctantInfo octantIfo(idx, true);
1407 
1408  int type;
1409  recvBuffer >> type;
1410 
1411  int entity;
1412  recvBuffer >> entity;
1413 
1414  long id = static_cast<VolOctree*>(m_mappedPatch)->getOctantId(octantIfo);
1415  mapping::Info &info = (*inverseLocalMapping)[id];
1416  info.type = mapping::Type(type);
1417  info.entity = mapping::Entity(entity);
1418  int nmap;
1419  recvBuffer >> nmap;
1420  for (int j=0; j<nmap; j++) {
1421  long idref;
1422  recvBuffer >> idref;
1423  info.ids.push_back(idref);
1424  info.ranks.push_back(rank);
1425  }
1426  }
1427 
1428  ++nCompletedRecvs;
1429  }
1430 
1431  mapCommunicator.waitAllSends();
1432 }
1433 
1438 void VolOctreeMapper::_communicateInverseMapperBack()
1439 {
1440  // Recover mapping elements to send (to partitions of mapped mesh)
1441  std::set<int> toRanks;
1442  std::map<int, std::vector<long>> toRankId;
1443  for (const auto &mappingEntry : m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping) {
1444  toRanks.insert(mappingEntry.first);
1445 
1446  const std::unordered_map<long, mapping::Info> &inverseMappingInfo = m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[mappingEntry.first];
1447  for (const auto &submappingEntry : inverseMappingInfo) {
1448  toRankId[mappingEntry.first].push_back(submappingEntry.first);
1449  }
1450  }
1451 
1452  // Build send buffers
1453  DataCommunicator mapCommunicator(m_communicator);
1454 
1455  // Set size
1456  for (int rank : toRanks) {
1457  const std::unordered_map<long, mapping::Info> &inverseMappingInfo = m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[rank];
1458 
1459  // Get buffer size
1460  std::size_t buffSize = 0;
1461  for (long id : toRankId[rank]) {
1462  const mapping::Info &info = inverseMappingInfo.at(id);
1463  int mappedSize = info.ids.size();
1464  std::size_t infoBytes = std::size_t(sizeof(long) + sizeof(int) + sizeof(int) + sizeof(int) + (sizeof(long))*mappedSize);
1465  buffSize += infoBytes;
1466  }
1467  buffSize += std::size_t(sizeof(int));
1468  mapCommunicator.setSend(rank,buffSize);
1469 
1470  // Fill buffer with octants and local map for inverse mapping
1471  SendBuffer &sendBuffer = mapCommunicator.getSendBuffer(rank);
1472  sendBuffer << int(toRankId[rank].size());
1473  for (long id : toRankId[rank]) {
1474  const mapping::Info &info = inverseMappingInfo.at(id);
1475  sendBuffer << id;
1476  sendBuffer << int(info.type);
1477  sendBuffer << int(info.entity);
1478  int mappedSize = info.ids.size();
1479  sendBuffer << mappedSize;
1480  for (long refId : info.ids) {
1481  sendBuffer << refId;
1482  }
1483  }
1484  }
1485 
1486  mapCommunicator.discoverRecvs();
1487  mapCommunicator.startAllRecvs();
1488  mapCommunicator.startAllSends();
1489 
1490  int nCompletedRecvs = 0;
1491  while (nCompletedRecvs < mapCommunicator.getRecvCount()) {
1492  int rank = mapCommunicator.waitAnyRecv();
1493  RecvBuffer &recvBuffer = mapCommunicator.getRecvBuffer(rank);
1494 
1495  int nof;
1496  recvBuffer >> nof;
1497  for (int i = 0; i < nof; i++) {
1498  long id;
1499  recvBuffer >> id;
1500 
1501  int type;
1502  recvBuffer >> type;
1503 
1504  int entity;
1505  recvBuffer >> entity;
1506 
1507  mapping::Info &info = m_inverseMapping[id];
1508  info.type = mapping::Type(type);
1509  info.entity = mapping::Entity(entity);
1510 
1511  // Keep only local mapping
1512  //
1513  // If partition is changed the mapping is always recomputed and not
1514  // updated.
1515  //
1516  // Remove old ids and ranks that don't belong to this partition.
1517  auto idsIter = info.ids.begin();
1518  auto ranksIter = info.ranks.begin();
1519  while (idsIter != info.ids.end()) {
1520  int rank = *ranksIter;
1521  if (rank != m_mappedPatch->getRank()) {
1522  idsIter = info.ids.erase(idsIter);
1523  ranksIter = info.ranks.erase(ranksIter);
1524  } else {
1525  idsIter++;
1526  ranksIter++;
1527  }
1528  }
1529 
1530  // Add received ids and ranks
1531  int nmap;
1532  recvBuffer >> nmap;
1533  for (int j=0; j<nmap; j++) {
1534  long idref;
1535  recvBuffer >> idref;
1536  info.ids.push_back(idref);
1537  info.ranks.push_back(rank);
1538  }
1539  }
1540 
1541  ++nCompletedRecvs;
1542  }
1543 
1544  mapCommunicator.waitAllSends();
1545 
1546 }
1547 
1557 void VolOctreeMapper::_communicateMappedAdaptionInfo(const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionInfoMap, std::vector<adaption::Info> *adaptionInfoRef)
1558 {
1559  // Recover mapping elements to send (to partitions of mapped mesh)
1560  std::set<int> toRanks;
1561  std::map<int, std::set<long>> toRankInd;
1562  std::map<int, std::vector<long>> toRankId;
1563 
1564  std::size_t n = 0;
1565  for (auto &info : adaptionInfoMap) {
1566  for (long id : info.previous) {
1567  auto itPreviousMapping = m_previousMapping.find(id);
1568  if (itPreviousMapping == m_previousMapping.end()){
1569  continue;
1570  }
1571  for (int rank : itPreviousMapping->second.ranks) {
1572  toRanks.insert(rank);
1573  toRankInd[rank].insert(n);
1574  toRankId[rank].push_back(id);
1575  }
1576  }
1577  ++n;
1578  }
1579 
1580  // Build send buffers
1581  DataCommunicator mapCommunicator(m_communicator);
1582 
1583  // Initialize communications
1584  for (int rank : toRanks) {
1585  std::size_t buffSize = 0;
1586  for (long id : toRankId[rank]) {
1587  const mapping::Info &info = m_previousMapping.at(id);
1588  int mappedSize = info.ids.size();
1589  std::size_t infoBytes = std::size_t(sizeof(long) + 3*sizeof(int) + (sizeof(long))*mappedSize);
1590  buffSize += infoBytes;
1591  }
1592  buffSize += std::size_t(sizeof(int));
1593 
1594  for (long ind : toRankInd[rank]) {
1595  const adaption::Info &info = adaptionInfoMap[ind];
1596  int currentSize = info.current.size();
1597  int previousSize = info.previous.size();
1598  std::size_t infoBytes = std::size_t(5*sizeof(int) + (sizeof(long))*(currentSize+previousSize));
1599  buffSize += infoBytes;
1600  }
1601  buffSize += std::size_t(sizeof(int));
1602 
1603  mapCommunicator.setSend(rank,buffSize);
1604 
1605  // Fill buffer with octants and local map for inverse mapper
1606  SendBuffer &sendBuffer = mapCommunicator.getSendBuffer(rank);
1607  sendBuffer << int(toRankId[rank].size());
1608  for (long id : toRankId[rank]) {
1609  auto itPreviousMapping = m_previousMapping.find(id);
1610  if (itPreviousMapping == m_previousMapping.end()){
1611  continue;
1612  }
1613  const mapping::Info &info = itPreviousMapping->second;
1614  sendBuffer << id;
1615  sendBuffer << int(info.type);
1616  sendBuffer << int(info.entity);
1617  int mappedSize = info.ids.size();
1618  sendBuffer << mappedSize;
1619  for (long refId : info.ids) {
1620  sendBuffer << refId;
1621  }
1622  }
1623 
1624  sendBuffer << int(toRankInd[rank].size());
1625  for (long ind : toRankInd[rank]) {
1626  const adaption::Info &info = adaptionInfoMap[ind];
1627  sendBuffer << int(info.type);
1628  sendBuffer << int(info.entity);
1629  int currentSize = info.current.size();
1630  int previousSize = info.previous.size();
1631  sendBuffer << currentSize;
1632  for (long Id : info.current) {
1633  sendBuffer << Id;
1634  }
1635  sendBuffer << previousSize;
1636  for (long Id : info.previous) {
1637  sendBuffer << Id;
1638  }
1639 
1640  // Rank of adaption is used to identify the rank where the adaption
1641  // occurs
1642  sendBuffer << m_rank;
1643  }
1644 
1645  }
1646 
1647  // Execute communications
1648  mapCommunicator.discoverRecvs();
1649  mapCommunicator.startAllRecvs();
1650  mapCommunicator.startAllSends();
1651 
1652  // Retrieve data
1653  int nCompletedRecvs = 0;
1654  while (nCompletedRecvs < mapCommunicator.getRecvCount()) {
1655  int rank = mapCommunicator.waitAnyRecv();
1656 
1657  RecvBuffer &recvBuffer = mapCommunicator.getRecvBuffer(rank);
1658  int nofMapper;
1659  recvBuffer >> nofMapper;
1660  for (int i = 0; i < nofMapper; i++) {
1661  long id;
1662  recvBuffer >> id;
1663 
1664  int mtype;
1665  recvBuffer >> mtype;
1666 
1667  int mentity;
1668  recvBuffer >> mentity;
1669 
1670  mapping::Info info;
1671  info.type = mapping::Type(mtype);
1672  info.entity = mapping::Entity(mentity);
1673  int nmap;
1674  recvBuffer >> nmap;
1675  for (int j=0; j<nmap; j++) {
1676  long idref;
1677  recvBuffer >> idref;
1678  info.ids.push_back(idref);
1679  info.ranks.push_back(m_rank);
1680  }
1681  m_partitionIR.map_rank_previousMapping[rank][id] = info;
1682  m_partitionIR.map_rank_inverseMapping[rank].erase(id);
1683  }
1684 
1685  int nofInfo;
1686  recvBuffer >> nofInfo;
1687  for (int i = 0; i < nofInfo; i++) {
1688  int type;
1689  recvBuffer >> type;
1690 
1691  int entity;
1692  recvBuffer >> entity;
1693 
1694  adaption::Info info;
1695  info.type = adaption::Type(type);
1696  info.entity = adaption::Entity(entity);
1697  int ncurrent;
1698  recvBuffer >> ncurrent;
1699  for (int j=0; j<ncurrent; j++) {
1700  long id;
1701  recvBuffer >> id;
1702  info.current.push_back(id);
1703  }
1704  int nprevious;
1705  recvBuffer >> nprevious;
1706  for (int j=0; j<nprevious; j++) {
1707  long id;
1708  recvBuffer >> id;
1709  info.previous.push_back(id);
1710  }
1711  int arank;
1712  recvBuffer >> arank;
1713  info.rank = arank;
1714  adaptionInfoRef->push_back(info);
1715  }
1716 
1717  ++nCompletedRecvs;
1718  }
1719 
1720  mapCommunicator.waitAllSends();
1721 }
1722 
1723 #endif
1724 
1725 }
